hints: This service was originally called iTools
It provides cloud storage and syncing for Apple devices
Launched in 2011 as a replacement for MobileMe
This service allows users to make payments using their Apple devices
It uses Near Field Communication (NFC) technology
Launched in 2014 in the United States
This service offers access to millions of songs for a monthly fee
It was launched after Apple's acquisition of Beats Electronics
Introduced in 2015 as a competitor to Spotify
This service offers original TV shows, movies, and documentaries
It features content from Oprah Winfrey and Steven Spielberg
Launched in November 2019
This service offers access to over 100 video games
It's available on iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and tvOS
Launched in September 2019
This service provides access to digital newspapers and magazines
It was created after Apple acquired Texture
Launched in March 2019
This service offers workout videos and personalized fitness plans
It integrates with Apple Watch for tracking metrics
Launched in December 2020
This service allows users to share app purchases and subscriptions
It includes up to six family members
Introduced in 2014 with iOS 8
This service provides virtual credit cards for online purchases
It's designed to work with Apple Pay
Launched in 2019 in partnership with Goldman Sachs
This service allows users to find lost Apple devices
It uses crowdsourced location data from Apple devices
Launched in 2019 as an expansion of Find My iPhone
This service provides cloud storage for photos and videos
It offers features like Memories and Shared Albums
Introduced in 2014 as a replacement for iPhoto
This service allows users to share their location with friends and family
It was originally a standalone app before being integrated into Find My
Launched in 2009
This service provides digital textbooks and course materials
It's designed for use in educational institutions
Launched in 2012

It uses facial recognition technology
Introduced with iOS 12 in 2018
This service bundles multiple Apple services into one subscription
